objects.text: • 925 Sterling Silver • Rose Gold • Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.

- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.

- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, romantic aesthetic ideal for promoting elegant jewelry gifts. The background is a gentle gradient of blush tones and layered abstract waves, forming a harmonious backdrop enhanced by faded decorative circles. At the center, a large circular area draws attention to the "product_image" featuring a pair of luxurious rose gold earrings. A vibrant pink accent circle showcases the "price" in bold white font. The "heading" and "subheading" text layers, using classic and elegant serif fonts, convey sophistication. The "description" highlights product features in a clean bullet layout, and a bold "cta" button invites user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink: `#FFF0F5`
- Blush Rose: `#FFD1DC`
- Rose Pink Gradient: `#F8BBD0` to `#F48FB1`
- Bold Pink: `#D81B60`
- Deep Maroon: `#AD1457`
- Accent Pink: `#C2185B`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings that incorporate a soft, rose gold metal base (#F4A7B9), which adds a delicate, feminine charm. The pale blush pink teardrop stone (#FAD9D5) forms the focal point, subtly complemented by sparkling white diamonds (#FFFFFF) and marquise-cut stones with hints of icy shimmer (#EDF0F5). The rose gold outline creates a rich contrast, highlighting the brilliance of the stones. The colors are seamlessly blended—soft pastels meet highly reflective surfaces, creating a balanced look of warmth and sparkle. For an advertisement banner, use a palette of blush pink (#FAD9D5), rose gold (#F4A7B9), white (#FFFFFF), and soft silver (#EDF0F5).
